# iru_prism_transparency_database (Data Source)

List TCC (Transparency, Consent, and Control) database entries from Prism.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iru_prism_transparency_database" "example" {}

output "tcc" {
  value = data.iru_prism_transparency_database.example.results
}
```
